item.title: 📝 taltas/chain_mail (25 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: taltas

📝 Repository: taltas/chain_mail

📄 Descrizione: ChainMail is a Ruby gem for reliable email delivery. It lets Rails apps send transactional emails through multiple providers with automatic failover, ensuring your messages get delivered even if one service fails.

⭐ Stelle: 25

🍴 Forks: 1

💻 Linguaggio: Ruby

📜 Licenza: MIT License

]]>
